Notes.Text:
This update for nginx fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-20372: Fixed an HTTP request smuggling with certain error_page 
  configurations which could have allowed unauthorized web page reads (bsc#1160682).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: NGINX before 1.17.7, with certain error_page configurations, allows HTTP request smuggling, as demonstrated by the ability of an attacker to read unauthorized web pages in environments where NGINX is being fronted by a load balancer.
